R2sLib

Class R2sLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • R2sLib.R2sLib

  • public class R2sLib
extends java.lang.Object
    R2sLib is the client side library for the R2s platform
    Author:
    mlbernardoni

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      R2sLib()
      R2sLib Constructor used to start an R2s service tree With R2sLib constructed with no parameters, the only functionality available is R2sRoot
      R2sLib(java.lang.String jb)
      R2sLib Constructor used within an R2s service tree

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String R2s_Complete()
      R2s_Complete
      When finished processing, the service will call R2s_Complete which informs the R2s Server that processing is complete and any child processes can be initiated.
      java.lang.String R2s_Contained(java.lang.String serviceurl, java.lang.String serviceparam)
      R2s_Contained
      Creates an contained service as a child service.
      java.lang.String R2s_Contained(java.lang.String serviceurl, java.lang.String serviceparam, int tries, int timeout, int timeoutwait)
      R2s_Contained
      Creates an contained service as a child service with retry parameters.
      java.lang.String R2s_Contained(java.lang.String serviceid, java.lang.String serviceurl, java.lang.String serviceparam)
      R2s_Contained
      Creates an contained service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID.
      java.lang.String R2s_Contained(java.lang.String serviceid, java.lang.String serviceurl, java.lang.String serviceparam, int tries, int timeout, int timeoutwait)
      R2s_Contained
      Creates an contained service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters
      All R2sLib register services must include:
      The URL of the service to add to the tree
      The Parameter passed to that service
      Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
      By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service
      java.lang.String R2s_Error(java.lang.String serviceurl, java.lang.String serviceparam)

      Creates an independent service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters
      All R2sLib register services must include:
      The URL of the service to add to the tree
      The Parameter passed to that service
      Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
      By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service
      java.lang.String R2s_Release()
      R2s_Release
      After registering child services, a service will call R2s_Release which will call the R2s Server to process the service sub-tree.

      void R2s_SetTimeout(int newtimeout)
      R2s_SetTimeout, R2s_SetTimeoutWait, R2s_SetTries
      the trio of functions used to change the default settings the client uses to call the R2s Server

      NOTE: to change the default settings used by the R2s Server when calling a service, see the functions for registering a service

      Creates an subsequent service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters
      All R2sLib register services must include:
      The URL of the service to add to the tree
      The Parameter passed to that service
      Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
      By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        public R2sLib(java.lang.String jb)
       throws java.io.IOException
        R2sLib Constructor used within an R2s service tree
        Parameters:
        jb - - the string retrieved from the HTTP Post request from R2s; allows full functionality of the library
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an incompatible request string was provided

    • Method Detail

      • R2s_SetTimeout

        public void R2s_SetTimeout(int newtimeout)

        R2s_SetTimeout, R2s_SetTimeoutWait, R2s_SetTries
        the trio of functions used to change the default settings the client uses to call the R2s Server

        NOTE: to change the default settings used by the R2s Server when calling a service, see the functions for registering a service

        Parameters:
        newtimeout - number of milliseconds before the call to R2s times out

      • R2s_SetTimeoutWait

        public void R2s_SetTimeoutWait(int newwait)

        R2s_SetTimeout, R2s_SetTimeoutWait, R2s_SetTries
        the trio of functions used to change the default settings the client uses to call the R2s Server

        NOTE: to change the default settings used by the R2s Server when calling a service, see the functions for registering a service

        Parameters:
        newwait - number of milliseconds to wait between attempted calls to the R2s Server

      • R2s_SetTries

        public void R2s_SetTries(int newtries)

        R2s_SetTimeout, R2s_SetTimeoutWait, R2s_SetTries
        the trio of functions used to change the default settings the client uses to call the R2s Server

        NOTE: to change the default settings used by the R2s Server when calling a service, see the functions for registering a service

        Parameters:
        newtries - number to tries to connect to the server (note 0 will not call the server)

      • R2s_GetID

        public java.lang.String R2s_GetID()

        R2s_GetID
        an function that is available to a client service, that gets an R2s compatible ID.
        This is available if a service wants to use an ID for another use but also register a service using that ID.
        For example, if a service wishes to use an ID as a file key in a database, the service would call R2s_GetID to get an ID, use that ID as the file ID in its own database, then register a service (such as "ParseFile") using that ID. This would in effect pass the file ID to the ParseFile service.

        Returns:
        an R2s compatible ID that can be passed into a register function

      • R2s_GetParam

        public java.lang.String R2s_GetParam()
                              throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_GetParam, R2s_GetRootID, R2s_GetParentID, R2s_GetServiceID
        The set of functions available to retrieve the data that was passed by the R2s Service

        Returns:
        the parameter passed by the R2s Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - invalid parameters were received in the request object

      • R2s_Root

        public java.lang.String R2s_Root(java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                 java.lang.String serviceparam)
                          throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Root
        Creates a new R2s Service Tree.
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Root

        public java.lang.String R2s_Root(java.lang.String serviceid,
                                 java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                 java.lang.String serviceparam)
                          throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Root with supplied ID retrieved from GetID
        Creates a new R2s Service Tree.
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceid - ID the application retrieved by using the GetID method
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Root

        public java.lang.String R2s_Root(java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                 java.lang.String serviceparam,
                                 int tries,
                                 int timeout,
                                 int timeoutwait)
                          throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Root with retry parameters
        Creates a new R2s Service Tree.
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        tries - The number of attempts the R2s server will use while calling the service
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds the R2s Server will wait on a service call
        timeoutwait - The time in milliseconds that the R2s Server will wait between attemps
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Root

        public java.lang.String R2s_Root(java.lang.String serviceid,
                                 java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                 java.lang.String serviceparam,
                                 int tries,
                                 int timeout,
                                 int timeoutwait)
                          throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Root with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters
        Creates a new R2s Service Tree.
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceid - ID the application retrieved by using the GetID method
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        tries - The number of attempts the R2s server will use while calling the service
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds the R2s Server will wait on a service call
        timeoutwait - The time in milliseconds that the R2s Server will wait between attemps
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

        R2s_Independent
        Creates an independent service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceid - ID the application retrieved by using the GetID method
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        tries - The number of attempts the R2s server will use while calling the service
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds the R2s Server will wait on a service call
        timeoutwait - The time in milliseconds that the R2s Server will wait between attemps
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Subsequent

        public java.lang.String R2s_Subsequent(java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                       java.lang.String serviceparam)
                                throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Subsequent
        Creates an subsequent service as a child service.
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Subsequent

        public java.lang.String R2s_Subsequent(java.lang.String serviceid,
                                       java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                       java.lang.String serviceparam)
                                throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Subsequent
        Creates an subsequent service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID.
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceid - ID the application retrieved by using the GetID method
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Subsequent

        public java.lang.String R2s_Subsequent(java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                       java.lang.String serviceparam,
                                       int tries,
                                       int timeout,
                                       int timeoutwait)
                                throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Subsequent
        Creates an subsequent service as a child service with retry parameters.
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        tries - The number of attempts the R2s server will use while calling the service
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds the R2s Server will wait on a service call
        timeoutwait - The time in milliseconds that the R2s Server will wait between attemps
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Subsequent

        public java.lang.String R2s_Subsequent(java.lang.String serviceid,
                                       java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                       java.lang.String serviceparam,
                                       int tries,
                                       int timeout,
                                       int timeoutwait)
                                throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Subsequent
        Creates an subsequent service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceid - ID the application retrieved by using the GetID method
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        tries - The number of attempts the R2s server will use while calling the service
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds the R2s Server will wait on a service call
        timeoutwait - The time in milliseconds that the R2s Server will wait between attemps
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Final

        public java.lang.String R2s_Final(java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                  java.lang.String serviceparam)
                           throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Final
        Creates an on final service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters. An on final service will be called when the service and all child services are final
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Error

        public java.lang.String R2s_Error(java.lang.String serviceurl,
                                  java.lang.String serviceparam)
                           throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Error
        Creates an on error service as a child service with supplied ID retrieved from GetID and with retry parameters. An on error service will only be called when the service or any of its child services error
        All R2sLib register services must include:
        The URL of the service to add to the tree
        The Parameter passed to that service
        Optionally an ID retrieved from GetID (see GetID for details)
        By default R2s calls the service at most once, if the service is idempotent optional parameters are available to instruct R2s to include retry logic while while calling the service

        Parameters:
        serviceurl - The URL of the Root Service
        serviceparam - The parameter passed into the Service
        Returns:
        The ID of the registered Root Service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Setpredecessor

        public void R2s_Setpredecessor(java.lang.String preid,
                               java.lang.String postid)
                        throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Setpredecessor
        Chains two services together as a predecessor and successor service. A common pattern is to create 2 independant services and chain them using R2s_Setpredecessor.
        This allows a service to create service chains (for example, validate transaction, authorize transaction, complete transaction).

        Parameters:
        preid - The ID of the predecessor service
        postid - The ID of the successor service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Release

        public java.lang.String R2s_Release()
                             throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Release
        After registering child services, a service will call R2s_Release which will call the R2s Server to process the service sub-tree.

        Returns:
        a success message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service

      • R2s_Complete

        public java.lang.String R2s_Complete()
                              throws java.io.IOException

        R2s_Complete
        When finished processing, the service will call R2s_Complete which informs the R2s Server that processing is complete and any child processes can be initiated.

        Returns:
        a success message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error creating the JSON object to pass to the R2s Service
